channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- DeltaV DCS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- DeltaV DCS

item.title: CVE-2018-14791|2024-08-05T09:38:13.977Z -- emerson -- deltav%20dcs
item.description: Emerson DeltaV DCS versions 11.3.1, 12.3.1, 13.3.0, 13.3.1, R5 may allow non-administrative users to change executable and library files on the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2018-14797|2024-08-05T09:38:14.042Z -- emerson -- deltav%20dcs
item.description: Emerson DeltaV DCS versions 11.3.1, 12.3.1, 13.3.0, 13.3.1, R5 allow a specially crafted DLL file to be placed in the search path and loaded as an internal and valid DLL, which may allow arbitrary code execution.
